thread.title: It's raining dead bodies: Unpublished video on MH17 crashing in Eastern Ukraine
thread.title_full: It's raining dead bodies: Unpublished video on MH17 crashing in Eastern Ukraine

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: It's raining dead bodies: Unpublished video on MH17 crashing in Eastern Ukraine
text:
It's raining dead bodies: Unpublished video on MH17 crashing in Eastern Ukraine Adv: 
Jul 20, 2015 Adv: 
It's raining dead bodies. These are the words of an East Ukrainian farmer seconds after the Malaysia Airlines plane MH17 crashed on his property killing 298 people on board. 
This video was never published until today. It shows locals slowly trying to understand what happened. 
While he was chasing to the dark clouds seen after the impact of the plane his wife shot the video on her cell phone in horror. 
You can hear her saying to her husband in Russian: "Please don't look. I saw an arm, I saw a leg - I cannot watch this. What happened ? A bus, a helicopter, a plane?" 
Watch the incredible video by this Ukrainian farmer.
